guide.busTitle: How to Book a Bus Ticket
guide.busIntro: Booking bus tickets online is a breeze. Follow these simple steps to secure your seat for your next journey, whether it's across town or across the country.
guide.busStep1Description: Open the recommended app and select your city's bus operator or the inter-city bus service you want to use.
guide.busStep2Description: Input your starting point, destination, and date of travel. Select the number of passengers.
guide.busStep3Description: Browse through the available buses. Look at timings, ratings, and amenities. Choose your preferred seat.
guide.busStep4Description: Proceed to the payment gateway. You can use credit/debit cards, net banking, or digital wallets.
guide.busStep5Description: Once payment is successful, your e-ticket will be generated. You can find it in the "My Bookings" section and in your email.
guide.metroTitle: How to Book a Metro Ticket
guide.metroIntro: Skip the long queues at the station. Buying your metro ticket online is fast, efficient, and gets you on your way quicker. Here's how.
guide.metroStep1Description: Go to the app store and download the official metro app for your city.
guide.metroStep2Description: Enter your starting and destination stations. The app will show you the route, fare, and travel time.
guide.metroStep3Description: Select between a single journey ticket, a return ticket, or a smart card recharge.
guide.metroStep4Description: Use your preferred payment method to complete the transaction.
guide.metroStep5Description: A QR code ticket will be generated. Scan it at the entry and exit gates of the metro stations.
guide.railwayTitle: How to Book a Railway Ticket
guide.railwayIntro: Booking train tickets online has never been easier. Follow this guide to navigate the official platforms and book your journey with confidence.
guide.railwayStep1Description: Visit the official railway website or app and log in with your credentials. If you are a new user, register first.
guide.railwayStep2Description: Enter your source and destination stations, travel date, and preferred class (e.g., Sleeper, AC).
guide.railwayStep3Description: Check seat availability for different trains. Once you find a suitable option, proceed to fill in passenger details.
guide.railwayStep4Description: Review your booking and make the payment through the various options available.
guide.railwayStep5Description: After a successful payment, you will receive a confirmation PNR number via SMS and email. Your ticket details can be viewed online.
